result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Oger Benitez

Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Aileen Henry in court for Oger Benitez. Defendant Oger Benitez in court. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Henry advises that there has not been a resolution yet but she will still working on it with the state.
Status conference scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 02:00 pm.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Aileen Henry in court for Oger Benitez. Defendant Oger Benitez in court. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Henry just got the DE's contact information. This matter is set with the co-defendant's case.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Aileen Henry in court for Oger Benitez. Defendant Oger Benitez in court. Clerk. M.Burke. This matter is set over.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

NO RECORD MADE.  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.   Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Henry was not aware of this hearing. STC set to 09/21/22 at 9:00.
Status conference on September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk. M.Burke. DE needs more time to get an attorney. DE needs to go to SPD to apply for a public defender. STC set to 09/02/220 at 10:00.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Sebastian X. - L., Javier B., Veronica B. and Heber B. - B.

02:59 PM  State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Christopher Bub.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 01:40 pm.
